analyzed: navattabba saṅgha udakkhiṇa visodhā iti iti kathā

original: Nanu saṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti?
analyzed: nanu saṅghaḥ āhuneyyaḥ pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyaḥ anuttaram puñña khettam lokassa ati

original: Hañci saṅgho āhuneyyo …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci saṅghaḥ āhuneyyaḥ pe anuttaram puññakkhettam lokassa tena vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatāti?
analyzed: nanu cattāro purisa yugā aṭṭha purisa puggalāḥ dakkhiṇeyyāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā ati

original: Hañci cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatā, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci cattāro purisa yugā aṭṭha purisa puggalāḥ dakkhiṇeyyāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā tena vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu atthi keci saṅghassa dānaṁ datvā dakkhiṇaṁ ārādhentīti?
analyzed: nanu atthi keci saṅghassa dānam da tvā dakkhiṇam ārādhenti iti

original: Hañci atthi keci saṅghassa dānaṁ datvā dakkhiṇaṁ ārādhenti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci atthi keci saṅghassa dānam da tvā dakkhiṇam ārādhenti tena vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu atthi keci saṅghassa cīvaraṁ datvā …pe…
analyzed: nanu atthi keci saṅghassa cīvaram da tvā pe
gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram da tvā
pānīyam da tvā dakkhiṇam ārādhenti iti

original: Hañci atthi keci saṅghassa pānīyaṁ datvā dakkhiṇaṁ ārādhenti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci atthi keci saṅghassa pānīyam da tvā dakkhiṇam ārādhenti tena vata re vattabbe

original: Na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetītikathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: na vattabbam saṅghaḥ dakkhiṇam visodheti iti kathā niṭṭhitā
